header.ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: this is a description about me

about.about_content: Hello! I'am Takoua, a passionate Front End Developer with a keen eye for design and knack for crafting seamless use experiences. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS and JavaScript, I specialize in building  responsive, user-friendly websites and web applications.
about.innovative: I thrive on introducing fresh, innovative ideas that bring value to every project. I approach problem-solving uniquely, ensuring that the projects I work on are not only functional but also exceptionally captivating and engaging.
about.creative: I derive immense satisfaction from taking on complex challenges, utilizing my sharp analytical skills, and deploying a meticulous attention to detail to deconstruct problems. This approach allows me to consistently deliver high-quality, impactful results.

skills.description: I have grown my frontend developments skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.

portfolio.desc: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
portfolio.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.polo_loco: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
portfolio.pokedex: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Got a problem to solve?
contact.text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.agree: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

Impressum.title: Legal Notice
Impressum.p6: The content of our pages has been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to general laws, as per § 7 Para.1 DDG. According to §§ 8 to 10 DDG, we are not obligated as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored external information or to investigate circumstances indicating illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected by this. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point in time at which a specific infringement becomes known. Upon becoming aware of such legal violations, we will remove the content immediately.
Impressum.p8: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites, the content of which we have no influence over. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the linked sites is always responsible for their content. The linked sites were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. No illegal content was recognizable at the time of linking. However, continuous content control of the linked sites is not reasonable without specific indications of a legal violation. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
Impressum.p10: The use of our website is usually possible without providing personal data. Insofar as personal data (such as name, address, or email addresses) are collected on our pages, this is always done on a voluntary basis as far as possible. This data will not be passed on to third parties without your explicit consent.
Impressum.p11: We point out that data transmission over the internet (e.g., when communicating via email) can have security vulnerabilities. A complete protection of the data from access by third parties is not possible.
Impressum.p12: The use of contact data published in the context of the imprint obligation by third parties for sending unsolicited advertisements and information materials is hereby expressly contradicted. The operators of the pages expressly reserve the right to take legal steps in the case of unsolicited sending of advertising information, such as spam emails.
